document_data.name: Torsyld Logging
document_data.mainbody:
'''Torsyld Logging''' was a well-kept lumber yard, and timber company, in the town of [[Velarsburg]], owned by the [[Torsyld]] family of [[Harrowdale]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Like all the logging operations of the region, the Torsyld family specialized in a particular type of wood: in their case, [[shadowtop]]. They were known for using the finest specimens of wood for use as ship masts, among other things.

{{Stub-geo}}
